name: gypsy
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a member of a race of people originally from northern India who typically used to travel from place to place, and now live especially in Europe and North America: a gypsy caravan/encampment
Add to word list
Add to word list
a member of a group of people who travel from place to place esp. in Europe and who originally came from northern India, or anyone who travels often and does not live in one place for long
